headline: Always Buy Simon Property Group's Preferred Stock When It Is Reasonably Priced
summary: Upgrade to Buy: Simon Property Group's SPG.PR.J offers a 5.98% yield to call. Click for more on SPG and why the preferred stock may be worth adding.
